page.title: 06Estate Farming
page.content: The{Kingsmill}family who own{ {Sydmonton Court Estate}live at{ {Malthouse Farm}which is situated in the north-eastern corner of the estate.There is a milking herd of 150 Friesian cows and 250 beef cattle.The crops grown on the 1,300 acre estate are feed grass,oats,barley and wheat. The family are very keen on nature conservation and the estate contains 200 acres of woodland which are the home of many forms of wildlife including deer.The deer are mostly small roe deer with a few barking deer.They are not kept as game,but to add to the natural beauty of the environment. The copses are mainly oak and ash but future plantings will include beech and wild cherry to add more colour.
